name: test_e2e_with_logs[497_ENC_CMDI_DBL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `ENC_CMDI_DBL_001` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded semicolon cat passwd |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | double_encoded |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;cat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:03.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001-1772277063018-bpivvr pattern_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001 uri=/?q=%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001-1772277063018-bpivvr pattern_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001 uri=/?q=%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```

```
